remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  The values of two acceptable functions are the same within their domains.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem5 $p |- ( ( g e. A /\ h e. A ) -> ( ( x g u /\ x h v ) -> u = v ) ) $.
$d A g h $.
$d F f g h u v x y $.
$d f g x y $.
$d f x y $.
